question: Which country is set to impose Anti-dumping tax on aluminium sheet exporters from 18 countries?
explanation:
The U.S. Department of Commerce is set to tax aluminium sheet exporters from 18 countries as it claims that they had benefited from subsidies and dumping.
It has determined that the imports from Germany benefited from dumping ranging from 40% to 242%. The investigation was initially launched under the Donald Trump administration.
